long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Job Application Tracker

Boost Your Job Search Efficiency with the Job Application Tracker Chrome Extension

Overview:

Job Application Tracker is a powerful Chrome extension designed to help job seekers organize, manage, and track their job applications effortlessly. Whether you are applying for multiple positions or need a structured way to follow up on applications, this extension provides all the tools you need to stay organized and increase your productivity.

Key Features:

Manage Job Applications:

Easily add, view, and delete job applications directly from the extensionâ€™s popup interface.
Keep track of important details like company name, position, application date, notes, and status (e.g., Applied, Interviewed, Offered, Rejected).
Automatic Job Details Extraction:

Extract job details seamlessly from LinkedIn job postings with just one click.
Save extracted details automatically into the extension for easy tracking and management.
Reminders and Notifications:

Set reminders to follow up on applications based on the application date.
Receive timely notifications to ensure you never miss an important follow-up.
Responsive Design:

Enjoy a user-friendly and responsive interface that works smoothly on different screen sizes.
Toggle the add application form and view application details with ease.
Why Use Job Application Tracker?

Stay Organized: Keep all your job applications in one place and access them anytime.
Save Time: Automatically extract job details from LinkedIn and save time on manual entry.
Never Miss a Follow-Up: Set reminders and receive notifications to stay on top of your job search.
User-Friendly Interface: Experience a clean and intuitive interface designed for efficiency.
Privacy and Security:

We value your privacy. Job Application Tracker does not share your data with third parties. All your data is stored locally on your device and is only accessible by you.

Get Started:

Install Job Application Tracker now and take control of your job search. Simplify the application process, stay organized, and boost your productivity.

Support:

If you have any questions, feedback, or need assistance, feel free to reach out to us at [support email]. We are here to help!(techion@teckiy.com)
